protected-instance-list.description: Protect instance ID of an ERPS ring.

guard-timer.description: Guard time for blocking received RAPS packets.

raps-mel.description: Maintenance entity group level for ring automatic protection switching.

version.description: Basic version of an ERPS ring.

revertive-enable.description: Enable/disable revertive status of an ERPS ring.

ring-role.description: Role information of an ERPS ring.

virtual-channel-enable.description: Enable/disable status of a virtual channel.

wtr-timer.description: Value of the actual Wtr running time.

holdoff-timer.description: Value of the actual Holdoff running time.

port-status.description: Discarding or forwarding of port status in ERPS ring.

signal-status.description: Whether the port signals on the ERPS ring are failed.

erps-statics.description: Statistics of sent and received ERPS PDUs on a port.
